sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO TB_GOODS_TIME( GOODS_CODE , TIME_SN , BEGIN_TIME , END_TIME , DELETE_AT , WRITNG_ID , WRITNG_DT ) VALUES( #GOODS_CODE# , (SELECT NVL(MAX(TIME_SN), 0)+1 FROM TB_GOODS_TIME WHERE GOODS_CODE = #GOODS_CODE#) , #BEGIN_TIME# , #END_TIME# , 'N' , #WRITNG_ID# , SYSDATE )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE TB_GOODS_TIME SET CL_NM = #CL_NM# , FILE_CODE = #FILE_CODE# , UPDT_ID = #UPDT_ID# , UPDT_DT = SYSDATE WHERE CL_CODE = #CL_CODE#
sqlMap.delete: UPDATE TB_GOODS_TIME SET DELETE_AT = 'Y' , UPDT_ID = #UPDT_ID# , UPDT_DT = SYSDATE WHERE CL_CODE = #CL_CODE#
sqlMap.select: SELECT GOODS_CODE , TIME_SN , BEGIN_TIME , SUBSTR(BEGIN_TIME, 1, 2) BEGIN_HH , SUBSTR(BEGIN_TIME, 3, 4) BEGIN_MI , END_TIME , SUBSTR(END_TIME, 1, 2) END_HH , SUBSTR(END_TIME, 3, 4) END_MI , DELETE_AT , WRITNG_ID , TO_CHAR(WRITNG_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD') WRITNG_DE FROM TB_GOODS_TIME WHERE GOODS_CODE = #GOODS_CODE# AND TIME_SN = #TIME_SN#

SELECT GOODS_CODE , TIME_SN , BEGIN_TIME , SUBSTR(BEGIN_TIME, 1, 2) BEGIN_HH , SUBSTR(BEGIN_TIME, 3, 4) BEGIN_MI , END_TIME , SUBSTR(END_TIME, 1, 2) END_HH , SUBSTR(END_TIME, 3, 4) END_MI , DELETE_AT , WRITNG_ID , TO_CHAR(WRITNG_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD') WRITNG_DE FROM TB_GOODS_TIME WHERE GOODS_CODE = #GOODS_CODE# AND DELETE_AT = 'N' ORDER BY TIME_SN
